actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Rules.

official_title: A resolution providing a special House rule for the remainder of the second session of the Ninety-ninth Congress prohibiting the inclusion of extraneous matters in reconciliation bills and amendments in connection with the most recently agreed to concurrent resolution on the budget for fiscal year 1987.

summary.text: Provides a special rule in the House of Representatives for the remainder of the second session of the 99th Congress to prohibit extraneous matters in reconciliation bills considered pursuant to the most recently agreed to concurrent resolution on the budget for FY 1987.

titles.title: A resolution providing a special House rule for the remainder of the second session of the Ninety-ninth Congress prohibiting the inclusion of extraneous matters in reconciliation bills and amendments in connection with the most recently agreed to concurrent resolution on the budget for fiscal year 1987.
